title: Projects
text:
Here’s a showcase of some of my recent projects. Each project demonstrates different skills and techniques in data science and programming.




A clustering model that identifies customer segments based on purchasing behavior, helping businesses target their marketing efforts more effectively.
View Project →




An interactive dashboard built with R Shiny that visualizes sales data and provides insights into regional performance and trends.
View Project →




A text analysis tool that extracts key topics and sentiment from customer reviews, helping businesses understand customer feedback at scale.
View Project →




A forecasting model that predicts future sales based on historical data, accounting for seasonality and external factors.
View Project →

title: Andrea Di Francia
text:
Hello! I’m Andrea, a data scientist and economist passionate about solving complex problems with data.


I work with data science tools and techniques to extract insights and build solutions. My expertise includes machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization.






Latest Projects



Check out my Projects page to see what I’ve been working on lately!

title: About Me
text: I am a Data Scientist and Economist with expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. With over 7 years of experience in both public and private sector, I specialize in developing predictive models and implementing data-driven solutions. I’m passionate about using data to solve real-world problems.

title: About Me
text: I am a Data Scientist and Economist with expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. With over 7 years of experience in both public and private sector, I specialize in developing predictive models and implementing data-driven solutions. I’m passionate about using data to solve real-world problems.

title: About Me
text:
Education

MSc in Applied Statistics & Operational Research | Birkbeck University, London
BSc in Economics | University of Nottingham

title: About Me
text:
Experience

Senior Data Scientist | HEOR | 2022-Present - Led development of predictive models for healthcare analytics - Implemented machine learning pipelines using Python and R - Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy solutions
Data Analyst | NHS England | 2018-2022 - Analyzed large healthcare datasets to extract business insights - Created interactive dashboards using Tableau and R Shiny - Automated reporting processes using Python
Economic Researcher | Department for Education | 2016-2018 - Conducted statistical analysis on education and workforce data - Developed economic models to evaluate policy effectiveness - Produced research reports for government stakeholders
Research Assistant | University of Nottingham | 2015-2016 - Assisted with economic research projects in the Department of Economics - Performed literature reviews and data collection - Contributed to academic publications

title: About Me
text:
Skills

Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL,
Data Science: Machine Learning, Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization
Tools: Jupyter, RStudio, Git, Docker
Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, tidyverse
